name: url-editor
description: 支持键盘快捷操作的URL编辑器

scripts.dev: bun run --cwd packages/core dev & bun run --cwd packages/shared dev & bun run --cwd packages/web dev
scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/core build & bun run --cwd packages/shared build & bun run --cwd packages/web build
scripts.test: bun run --cwd packages/core test & bun run --cwd packages/shared test & bun run --cwd packages/web test
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd packages/core lint & bun run --cwd packages/shared lint & bun run --cwd packages/web lint
scripts.clean: bun run --cwd packages/core clean & bun run --cwd packages/shared clean & bun run --cwd packages/web clean
